verses.verse: Now it happened when <S%H139>Adoni-Zedek<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>how<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> had <S%H3920>taken<s%> <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> and had utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> <S%H6213>it;<s%> as he had done to <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> and her <S%H4428>king,<s%> so he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai<s%> and her <S%H4428>king;<s%> and how the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> had made <S%H7999>peace<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and were among <S%H7130>them;<s%>

that they were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> because <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H4467>royal<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and because it was <S%H1419>greater<s%> than <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> and all its <S%H582>men<s%> were <S%H1368>mighty.<s%>

Therefore <S%H139>Adoni-Zedek<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H1944>Hoham<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> to <S%H6502>Piram<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3412>Jarmuth,<s%> to <S%H3309>Japhia<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3923>Lachish,<s%> and to <S%H1688>Debir<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5700>Eglon,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Come <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H5826>me,<s%> and help <S%H5221>me,<s%> and let us strike <S%H1391>Gibeon;<s%> for it has made <S%H7999>peace<s%> with <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

Therefore the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3412>Jarmuth,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3923>Lachish,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5700>Eglon,<s%> gathered themselves <S%H622>together,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up,<s%> they and all their <S%H4264>armies,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> against <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%> and made war against <S%H3898>it.<s%>

The <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3027>"Don't<s%> <S%H7503>abandon<s%> your <S%H5650>servants!<s%> Come <S%H5927>up<s%> to us <S%H4120>quickly,<s%> and <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H5826>us,<s%> and help <S%H4428>us;<s%> for all the kings of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the hill <S%H2022>country<s%> have gathered together against <S%H6908>us.<s%>"
So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> <S%H5971>he,<s%> and all the people of <S%H4421>war<s%> with <S%H1368>him,<s%> and all the mighty men of <S%H2428>valor.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H3372>"Don't<s%> fear <S%H5414>them,<s%> for I have delivered them into your <S%H3027>hands.<s%> Not a <S%H376>man<s%> of them will <S%H5975>stand<s%> before <S%H6440>you.<s%>"
<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> therefore <S%H935>came<s%> on them <S%H6597>suddenly.<s%> He went <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> all <S%H3915>night.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2000>confused<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and he <S%H5221>killed<s%> them with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%> at <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%> and <S%H7291>chased<s%> them by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> of Beth <S%H1032>Horon,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> them to <S%H5825>Azekah<s%> and to <S%H4719>Makkedah.<s%>

It <S%H5127>happened,<s%> as they fled from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> while they were at the <S%H4174>descent<s%> of Beth <S%H1032>Horon,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> cast <S%H4174>down<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> from the <S%H8064>sky<s%> on them to <S%H5825>Azekah,<s%> and they <S%H4191>died.<s%> There were <S%H7227>more<s%> who <S%H4191>died<s%> from the <S%H1259>hailstones<s%> than <S%H834>who<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2026>killed<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> delivered <S%H5414>up<s%> the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8121>"Sun,<s%> stand <S%H1826>still<s%> on <S%H1391>Gibeon!<s%> <S%H3394>You,<s%> moon, stop in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H357>Aijalon!<s%>"

The <S%H8121>sun<s%> stood <S%H1826>still,<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> <S%H5975>stayed,<s%> until the <S%H1471>nation<s%> had <S%H5358>avenged<s%> themselves of their <S%H341>enemies.<s%> <S%H1931>Isn't<s%> this <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H3477>Jashar?<s%> The <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H5975>stayed<s%> in the <S%H2677>midst<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and <S%H213>didn't<s%> hurry to go <S%H935>down<s%> about a <S%H8549>whole<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

There was no <S%H3117>day<s%> like that <S%H6440>before<s%> it or <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3068>it,<s%> that Yahweh <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of a <S%H376>man;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H4264>him,<s%> to the camp to <S%H1537>Gilgal.<s%>
These <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and <S%H2244>hid<s%> themselves in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> at <S%H4719>Makkedah.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> was <S%H5046>told,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> are <S%H4672>found,<s%> <S%H2244>hidden<s%> in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> at <S%H4719>Makkedah.<s%>"

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1556>"Roll<s%> <S%H1419>large<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> to the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H4631>cave,<s%> and <S%H6485>set<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> by it to guard <S%H8104>them;<s%>

but <S%H5975>don't<s%> stay. <S%H7291>Pursue<s%> <S%H310>your<s%> <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and strike them from the <S%H2179>rear.<s%> <S%H5414>Don't<s%> allow them to <S%H935>enter<s%> into their <S%H5892>cities;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"

It <S%H3091>happened,<s%> when Joshua and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H5221>killing<s%> them with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%> until they were <S%H8552>consumed,<s%> and the <S%H8300>remnant<s%> which <S%H8277>remained<s%> of them had <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%>

that all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> at <S%H4719>Makkedah<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%> None <S%H2782>moved<s%> his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> against <S%H376>any<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6605>"Open<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H4631>cave,<s%> and bring those <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of the cave to <S%H4631>me.<s%>"

They <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H2568>so,<s%> and brought those five <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4631>cave<s%> to <S%H4428>him:<s%> the king of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3412>Jarmuth,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3923>Lachish,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5700>Eglon.<s%>

It <S%H4428>happened,<s%> when they brought those kings <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> that <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H7101>chiefs<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> who <S%H1980>went<s%> with <S%H7126>him,<s%> "Come near, <S%H7760>put<s%> your <S%H7272>feet<s%> on the <S%H6677>necks<s%> of these <S%H4428>kings.<s%>" They came <S%H7126>near,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> their <S%H7272>feet<s%> on their <S%H6677>necks.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3372>them,<s%> "Don't be afraid, nor be <S%H2865>dismayed.<s%> Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H553>courageous,<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> this to all your <S%H341>enemies<s%> against whom you <S%H3898>fight.<s%>"

<S%H310>Afterward<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H4191>them,<s%> put them to death, and <S%H8518>hanged<s%> them on <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H6086>trees.<s%> They were <S%H8518>hanging<s%> on the <S%H6086>trees<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

It happened at the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the going <S%H935>down<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> that <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> and they took them <S%H3381>down<s%> off the <S%H6086>trees,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> them into the <S%H4631>cave<s%> in which they had <S%H2244>hidden<s%> <S%H7760>themselves,<s%> and laid <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> on the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H4631>cave,<s%> which remain to this <S%H6106>very<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H4719>Makkedah<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> with its <S%H4428>king.<s%> He utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> them and all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> who were in <S%H7604>it.<s%> He left none <S%H8300>remaining.<s%> He <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4719>Makkedah<s%> as he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>
<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> from <S%H4719>Makkedah,<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H3841>him,<s%> to Libnah, and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3841>Libnah.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it <S%H4428>also,<s%> with its king, into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> He <S%H5221>struck<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> who were in <S%H7604>it.<s%> He left none <S%H8300>remaining<s%> in <S%H6213>it.<s%> He did to its <S%H4428>king<s%> as he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> from <S%H3841>Libnah,<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H3923>him,<s%> to Lachish, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> against <S%H3898>it,<s%> and fought against it.

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H3923>Lachish<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> He <S%H3920>took<s%> it on the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> with all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> who were in <S%H6213>it,<s%> according to all that he had done to <S%H3841>Libnah.<s%>

Then <S%H2036>Horam<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1507>Gezer<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H3923>Lachish;<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> him and his <S%H5971>people,<s%> until he had <S%H7604>left<s%> him none <S%H8300>remaining.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> from <S%H3923>Lachish,<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H5700>him,<s%> to Eglon; and they <S%H2583>encamped<s%> against it fought against <S%H3898>it.<s%>

They <S%H3920>took<s%> it on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%> He utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> who were in it that <S%H3117>day,<s%> according to all that he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3923>Lachish.<s%>
<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H5700>Eglon,<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H2275>him,<s%> to Hebron; and they fought against <S%H3898>it.<s%>

They <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H5221>it,<s%> and struck it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> with its <S%H4428>king<s%> and all its <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> who were in <S%H7604>it.<s%> He left none <S%H8300>remaining,<s%> according to all that he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H5700>Eglon;<s%> but he utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> <S%H5315>it,<s%> and all the souls who were in it.
<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H1688>him,<s%> to Debir, and fought against <S%H3898>it.<s%>

He <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H4428>it,<s%> with its king and all its <S%H5892>cities.<s%> They <S%H5221>struck<s%> them with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> who were in <S%H7604>it.<s%> He left none <S%H8300>remaining.<s%> As he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> so he <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H1688>Debir,<s%> and to its <S%H4428>king;<s%> as he had <S%H6213>done<s%> also to <S%H3841>Libnah,<s%> and to its <S%H4428>king.<s%>

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> all the <S%H776>land,<s%> the hill <S%H776>country,<s%> and the <S%H5045>South,<s%> and the <S%H8219>lowland,<s%> and the <S%H794>slopes,<s%> and all their <S%H4428>kings.<s%> He <S%H7604>left<s%> none <S%H8300>remaining,<s%> but he utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> all that <S%H5397>breathed,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>
<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> them from Kadesh <S%H6947>Barnea<s%> even to <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> and all the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen,<s%> even to <S%H1391>Gibeon.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> all these <S%H4428>kings<s%> and their <S%H776>land<s%> at <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6471>time,<s%> because <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H4264>him,<s%> to the camp to <S%H1537>Gilgal.<s%>
